title: What you can and can't report for in league of legends-An interpretation
body:
I thought I'd make a thread like this because I've seen a lot of people in my games reporting others for things that, at least how I see, cannot be reported for. First, let's look at what can be reported;
http://i.imgur.com/CnMyumI.png
**1. Negative Attitude**-This is pretty self explanatory; basically, if someone is just being nasty and tilting your teammates, it falls under negative attitude.
**2. Verbal Abuse**-Also pretty self explanatory, just putting down your teammates and directly going out of your way to be harass someone on the team.
**3. Leaving Games/AFK**-Also very self explanatory
**4. Intentional Feeding**-Now THIS is where I see a lot of people misinterpret and report people who really shouldn't have been. THE KEY WORD HERE IS INTENTIONAL. If someone plays a new champion, or just is on tilt or has a bad game, PLEASE don't report them for this. I've seen so often some teammates gets reported because the team gets mad at them that they had a bad game and we lost because of it. If someone is being nasty at you because you had a bad game, they should be the ones reported, not you.
**5. Hate Speech**-This is basically sexism, racism, and homophobia. Swearing/Cursing DOES NOT count as hate speech. It CAN however, count as negative attitude, verbal abuse, and unsportsmanlike conduct if it is directed at a teammate. If someone is on tilt and says something like "holy shit" in the chat, it wouldn't count as hate speech, unless they swear directly at a teammate. 
**6. Cheating**-Just make sure it's actual cheating before reporting.
**7. Offensive/Inappropriate Summoner Name **-Self explanatory
